name: Monkey Runner
description:
Trex Runner Game Made by p5.js.

If you guys are wondering how to play this game, you have to use the space bar to jump over the rocks and get the banana. Every time you hit the rocks, you get smaller, but every time you get the bananas, you get back your regular size. The more bananas you get, the more your score will increase.

Donations Would Be Very Helpful to make Even more games.
